description: Structural detail sheet with 9 numbered details covering stud wall framing, header sizing at openings, roof-to-wall connections (hurricane ties), DTC clip layout and max spacing, sheathing pier plan, and floor blocking details (perpendicular and parallel to joists).
key_content: Header sizing: 8'-0" max opening = (1) trimmer, 12'-0" max opening = (2) trimmers
DTC clips: Simpson DTC clip (LSRC20 / LTA20 type), 4-8d nails minimum per clip
Stud wall framing section: P.T. sill plate, studs at 16" O.C., double top plate, wall sheathing, interior GWB
Roof-to-wall connection: hurricane tie hardware at rafter/truss to top plate (Detail 4)
Roof plan with DTC clip layout showing spacing pattern (Detail 1)
Sheathing pier plan with panel orientation and nailing zones (Detail 5)
Blocking perpendicular to joist: 2x blocking, 3-16d nails at each end (Detail 9/Section A)
Blocking parallel to joist: blocks at 4'-0" O.C. max, 2-16d or 3-8d nails (Detail 6/Section B)
DTC clips can be omitted at interior walls (Note 2 under Detail 7)
DTC clip max spacing table (Detail 2): values partially obscured by watermark
NOT SHOWN: specific hurricane tie model number (partially obscured, appears to be H2.5 or similar)

drawing_zones.content: Shear wall framing elevation with header sizing rules (1 trimmer for 8' max, 2 trimmers for 12' max)
Roof framing connection / hurricane tie detail at rafter-to-top-plate
Roof plan showing DTC clip layout with spacing and DTC clip max spacing table
Full stud wall framing section — foundation to roof plate
Sheathing pier plan view with nailing zones
DTC clip max spacing detail with installation specs
Blocking perpendicular to joist (Section A) — 2x blocking with 3-16d nails
Blocking parallel to joist (Section B) — blocks at 4'-0" O.C. max
